entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
